org.dockbox.selene.core.impl.util.events

Class SimpleEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.core.impl.util.events.SimpleEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.dockbox.selene.core.util.events.EventBus

    public class SimpleEventBus
extends Object
implements org.dockbox.selene.core.util.events.EventBus
    A simple default implementation of EventBus, used for internal event posting and handling.

    • Field Summary

      The internal registry of handlers for each event.

      A map of all listening objects with their associated IWrappers.

      • checkListenerMethod

        protected static void checkListenerMethod(Method method,
                                          boolean checkAnnotation)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if a method is a valid listener method. A method is only valid if it:
        • Is annotated with Listener
        • Is not static
        • Is not abstract
        • Has at least one parameter which is a subcless of Event
        Parameters:
        method - the method
        checkAnnotation - the check annotation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
